Name: RetroMaze
About the game: A relaxing retrowave stylized maze game that increases the difficulty as you progress through the levels . RetroMaze has a beautiful visual concept , as well as an exciting soundtrack . Scalable difficulty. 30 Levels. Cool retrowave stylized visual, soundtrack and achievements. Plans on adding trading cards, beautiful backgrounds and emoticons. 'RetroMaze' powered by GameMaker Studio 2. Music by 'Karl Casey' @ White Bat Audio.
